summary: Tae Sik, a troubled middle aged man and Sang Hwan, a troubled youth will meet in the ring with their respective mission. To change their life.
cast: Choi Min-sik|Seung-bum Ryoo|Kil-kang Ahn|Jeong-ah Bae|Kim Byeong-Ok|Ho-jin Chun|Ju-bong Gi|Byun Hee-Bong|Choon-ha Hwang|In-gi Jeong|Su-hyeon Kim|Yeong-In Kim|Moon-hee Na|Dal-su Oh|Hye-rin Seo|Im Won-hee
title: Jumeogi unda
